Before i get into pros and cons i just want to explain a bit about my personal experience. Been playing this game since 2018 as it was free for PS Plus on PS4. As i like multiplayer horror games i thought i would give it a go and it was worth the while. I do prefer Friday the 13th but that opinion has changed slightly due to what's happened with that game. Dead by daylight though i re purchased but for the PC over a year ago as i like the game and have few people to go on with now and then. Recently i have got back into it and it has changed quite a bit with the graphics and UI. So new players won't obviously no any different but returning players will.

It's a decent game which can be played either with friends or without but it's more fun with friends in my opinion. I do prefer playing as a survivor in this game and it's the same with Friday the 13th. There are a good amount of survivors as well as killers with the base game and the rest can be earned over time or purchased. Usually when a new update comes out there is a new map, a survivor and a killer. New update coming soon by the way at the time of this review.

Goal for the match as a survivor is to escape by turning all the generators on and escape at one of the two exits. As the killer you want to make sure that's not gonna be an option. There is more to a match than that though but you will learn this as you play. After a match you gain Blood Points, XP for your player level across both killer and survivor, pips for your Killer rank and survivor rank for the current season. (some players may call it pips but it's like a point towards the next rank up) All of what is earned though depends on how well you did in that match, you will learn this as you play. Blood points are spent on the blood web which changes every time you level up your character (You level up your character as you spend blood points on the blood web)

This game can be decent as mentioned before but has a lot of Toxic players. The matchmaking isn't great ether which leads to long wait times and in balanced matches as well. If your playing with friends and your all complete different ranks don't expect a balanced match. If your playing solo it should be putting you with similar ranks but even that doesn't work half of the time. Now i have briefly explained some things, below will be my given rating, pros and cons.

+Pros
+Good Graphics for low end and high end PC's. (Don't need a great machine to run this game)
+Plenty of content to keep you going.
+It's Fun played solo. (But More fun with friends in my opinion)
+2021 and Still being updated. (New Update coming soon at time of review)

-Cons
-A lot of toxic players
-Poor Matchmaking (Long wait times and possible in balanced match) 
- Can be buggy

My Rating *6.5/10* - A decent Multiplayer Horror game even in 2021, with or without friends.

the gamer is not perfect, it has its issues for sure. The thing game has in abundance is a massive team of dedicated people working constantly to fix any of these issues! which they do very fast and reliable.

This game is like an abusive relationship. You both start off fine, you both start getting comfortable, they start telling you all the new experiences you'll both go through, how you'll never leave their side. They start asking for money, you get concerned with the other people they've been playing with, them and their friends shit talk you, you share this with them and how it's bothering you, they gas light you that everything is fine and that they're listening to you, they convince you that your over reacting, this goes on for years while draining your bank account. By the time  you build up enough courage and you're ready to leave, "Hey babe look, a new Tome and chapter just came out ;)"
Large woman hits me with axe and romantically carries me to a meat hook. 11/10. Would buy again.
